Job Posting:169834 - Position: F25 63494R-Intern M Software Engineering 169834B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 06/03/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 05/20/2025 02:37 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Juniper Networks Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Salary Range $ Job Description About the Role: 2025 - Fall F25 63494R-Intern M Software Engineering 169834B Co-op Position Sunnyvale, CA USA 4 months US 0.0 per hour for 0 Major List $84,000.80 - $120,750.55 per year We are looking for a motivated and talented Full Stack Developer Intern who is passionate about building scalable web applications and exploring the exciting world of Artificial Intelligence. You will work closely with our engineering team to design, develop, and deploy full-stack solutions using modern technologies. Key Responsibilities: • Develop and maintain frontend components using React.js. • Build and manage backend services and APIs using Node.js and Python. • Work with PostgreSQL databases for data storage and management. • Integrate and deploy applications on AWS Cloud. • Collaborate on AI/ML modules and assist with integrating them into production systems. • Participate in code reviews, agile sprints, and regular standups. Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code. • What You'll Gain: • Real-world experience with a modern tech stack. • Mentorship from experienced engineers. • Opportunity to contribute to live projects and AI-based solutions. • A chance to receive a full-time offer based on performance. In addition, you will join our comprehensive University Talent Program that fosters personal as well as professional growth, thoroughly preparing interns for the next step in their careers. Juniper internships are project-based, allowing interns to solve important problems, make lasting impacts on their teams, and contribute to the company's overall objectives. Interns are mentored by some of the most talented and skillful innovators in the industry; you will connect with transformative thought leaders who promote disruptive ideas in their field. You will also participate in constructive professional workshops, company-wide community service initiatives, and an executive speaker series. You'll build lasting friendships, expand your network, and connect with colleagues from around the world. Job Requirements Required Skills: • Proficiency in Python and JavaScript. • Hands-on experience with React.js and Node.js. • Basic knowledge of PostgreSQL or other relational databases. • Familiarity with AWS services such as EC2, S3, Lambda, etc. • Understanding of full-stack development principles and RESTful APIs. • Exposure to or interest in Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning. Good problem-solving skills and a willingness to learn. • Preferred Qualifications: • Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field. • Previous internship/project experience in full stack development. • Familiarity with Git, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines is a plus. Curiosity about AI trends and real-world applications. • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: 63494R-Intern M Software Engineering - Juniper Networks Careers Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
